body_html:
Hi, yes. We recently added support for Tensor state_size as well as Tensor batch size. However to simplify the logic of propagating both the dynamic and static concatenation of the two, and to make explicit the requirement that batch size should be either a scalar or a len 1 vector, we added this check. My goal is to avoid more opaque errors down the line if someone provides a higher rank batch size.
…

body:
Hi, yes.  We recently added support for Tensor state_size as well as Tensor
batch size. However to simplify the logic of propagating both the dynamic
and static concatenation of the two, and to make explicit the requirement
that batch size should be either a scalar or a len 1 vector, we added this
check.  My goal is to avoid more opaque errors down the line if someone
provides a higher rank batch size.

On May 27, 2017 5:20 PM, "Justine Tunney" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @ebrevdo <https://github.com/ebrevdo> Our friend is curious about a your
> recent change 54efd63
> <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/54efd636b504aad368eea254eca2970a16d457f6>
> which added a precondition to prevent undefined shapes.
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub

> or mute the thread

> .
